content: Ok, I'm back. limit lifted. We lost a lot with all the revisions of the code, so let's try to keep that tighter. Try to be thorough and not allow the same mistake to repeat, learn when to back up and slow down. I know you're great at this and can do it fast. Let's keep going. Try to build the best system you can build based on the initial ask. Build the highest value components first and let me know when we reach the point of diminishing returns. You decide what's next. I am providing oversight and we can only work within the limitations that each technology allows. Is that OK?
